name: Lee Rodgers
text:
Tim Floyd  repainted my car hood. It looks great and they even replaced my Ford logo on the front of my car.
Job was completed as promised. I highly recommend them.

name: Ronald Payne
text: Great business. Excellent repair work

name: Carolyn Kennedy
text: I always receive quality service, and the staff are courteous and friendly.

name: Jason Cooley
text: BMW Service is definitely recommended. Thet are the most professional nicest people that will take care of your car and don't charge you an fortune. If you own an BMW go to BMW of Mobile they will take care of you fairly. I really enjoyed the friendly and wonderful staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We are thrilled that you had a pleasant service visit!

name: George Richaud
text: Great customer service,  very professional and courteous,  I rather bring my car here than Sandy Sansing in Pensacola. Worth the drive!!

resp.text: Thank you, George, for your kind words! We thank you for your business and look forward to your next visit!

name: K. Moses
text: Very clean place - even the service department. Service advisor  - Carie King is great.

resp.text: Thank you K. Moses for your kind words for Carie! We are thrilled that she provided you with a very clean service visit. We look forward to your business with us again!

name: Sam Kennedy
text: The staff is really nice, but they were blaring Fox news on every TV in the waiting area. Idk man kinda wack:/

resp.text:
Thank you for the compliment of our staff… the television stations are changed upon customer’s request and today’s selection included the Food Network, Fox News and Hallmark Christmas Channel. We apologize if you were unhappy with those choices
Scott Davis
General Manager

name: Christa Reny
text: Super friendly with quick service

resp.text: Thank you for being our customer, we appreciate your kind words!

name: Willielean Ealon
text: That place got it going on!

resp.text: Thank you for being our customer, we appreciate your kind words!

text: Got my battery replaced before the end of the day.

resp.text: Thank you. We're glad that you had an excellent experience with your recent battery replacement.

name: Frank Turner
text: Solid service

resp.text: Thank you for your visit!

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Car looks new, outstanding work. I will return if needed. The staff were very welcoming.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth, for this awesome five star feedback! Have a fantastic day!!!

name: Chris K
text: Absolutely no one could tell which side was touched up. They did a terrific job, and provided a warranty in case I ever ran into trouble with it. The pictures from 2-3 months after their work speak for themselves!

resp.text:
Chris,
We are pleased to hear no one is able to tell you had some work done and that everything turned out so well!! Thank you

name: The Dirt Road Liars
text: Best experience. They updated me regularly! And was very prompt with information regarding my repairs. Excellent service

resp.text:
The Dirt Road Liars,

We are so pleased to hear that you are satisfied with the overall service and sincerely appreciate the positive feedback. We hope you have a great weekend!

name: Tiffany Medley
text: Friendly customer service and great prices

resp.text: Thank you Tiffany for the awesome five star feedback! Have a great day!!!

name: Jorge F. Rodriguez
text: I have been in the automotive business as. Pre-owned  Manager and deal and have dealt with many body shops. Back in November my wife and I had an accident in Anniston Alabama. Unfortunately we had to leave our car their and rent a car and drive back home to Miami Florida. Never did I expect the amazing quality of work , service and attention that they gave me. Conchetta Ward tended to me long distance. I was concern because I didn’t know the town or anyone their. She was amazing in the professional but in the way yet made me feel like I knew her a very long time. Their was a small issue when I get the car back but they where extremely quick to respond and took care of the issue. In live things will happen but like I always said it’s not what happens but how it handle and they handle it great. I very highly recommend them!!

resp.text:
Jorge,

We are so pleased to hear how great your experience was and that the Anniston team could assist you with the repairs to your vehicle and that the process was smooth and completed in a timely manner. We sincerely appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: jason smith (stump)
text: Easy process just dropped car off and a week later good as new.

resp.text:
Jason,

We are so pleased to hear that you are satisfied with the overall service and sincerely appreciate the positive feedback. We hope you have a great day!

resp.text: Erika, we are happy to hear the Anniston location was able to repair your daughter's vehicle and that it looks new again!! Thank you, have a great day!

name: Tae Tae
text: Speedy service

resp.text: Thank you for the five stars! Have an awesome day!!!

Luis,

Gerber Collision in Moody AL gave me the most excellent, professional service from every corner they took excellent care of my car.

They were friendly fast and awesome.

Please see the before and after pictures

resp.text:
Cherryl,

We are so pleased to hear that the Moody team could assist you with the repairs to your vehicle and that you are satisfied with the overall service. We sincerely appreciate the 5 star review and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: Cassandra Naylor
text: I definitely recommend Gerber.  You would never know my car had been wrecked.  The employees are very professional.  They give you updates on your car which is also great.  I am so pleased with they work.  Thank you all at Gerber Collision!!

resp.text: Cassandra, wonderful to hear that the team did such a great job you're not able to tell it was in a previous wreck. We are happy they were also so professional and provided great communication! Thank you!!

name: linda Posey Mize
text: The employees at Gerber were very polite and helpful. I went there because of an accident when State Farm recommended them. They made the front of my car look like new!

resp.text:
Linda,
It is wonderful to hear that our team treated you so well and made your car look like new! We truly appreciate your taking the time to leave this feedback and hope you have a great day!

name: william powell
text:
Great Place and Friendly Staff.
They had my car for a week, got it back today. My BMW looks as good today as the day I bought it. My car was cleaned inside and outside even my rims shine. Nice job guys !
I hope there's not a next time but if there is I know where to bring my car.

resp.text: William, its great to hear that the Moody team for your BMW back to you in such a timely matter and made sure to give it back to you all clean and looking better then ever!!! We hope to see you again in the future, if needed! Safe travels!

name: Jerry Pellegrini
text: This place is hands down one of the best and most professional body shops I've ever had the pleasure of working with.  They called within 30 minutes of filing the insurance claim to perform the estimate.  The estimate was ready the same day we dropped it off, the work started immediately after the estimate was complete.  We got regular text message updates on the progress AND the car looks fantastic!

resp.text:
Jerry,

We are so pleased to hear how great your experience was and that the Moody team could assist you with the repairs to your vehicle and that the process was smooth and completed in a timely manner. We sincerely appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: Kelly Frost
text: The night before Thanksgiving I hit a deer on the way to the gas station. Gerber Collision (Moody) made the process quick and painless! In less than a week I was back in my truck! They kept me informed throughout the process and made sure all my questions were answered! They even took care of my rental return to Enterprise! 10/10 overall experience from drop off to pick up!

resp.text: Kelly, its awesome to hear that the Moody team was able to get your vehicle in and out of repairs in such a timely manner and you had such a great experience overall! We hope to see you again in the future, if needed!

name: Camron Morgan
text: Highly recommend using these guys! Had my bumper replaced and can't even tell anything was ever wrong with the car. The paint looks great and was updated through calls the whole time.

name: Sam NA
text: UPDATE: I spoke with Kevin and he acknowledged that there needs to be a more thorough inspection under certain circumstances. I felt comfortable speaking to him and believe that any customer service issue that I have will be satisfactory resolved if I choose to use them in the future. Original  Review. Not impressed, they were slow, one customer and walked right by me. Quote was incomplete and the guy helping me didn't know what he was doing.

name: JENNIFER BROOKS
text: Absolutely love this place... great people who are friendly and experienced experts. My vehicle was rear ended and damaged pretty bad and these guys repaired it so well that you couldn't ever noticed it had even been in a accident. They matched the paint perfect! Good job to all of you guys and supervisors who helped fix my ride...😃

text: Great experience, staff was courteous, and experienced. Quick turn- around, highly recommended

name: Tiffany Eunice
text:
They were just so nice and very professional. I came in with my bumper popped up and the fixed free!!!
It was just a matter of putting the clip back together.
Thank you.

name: Josh Hodge
text: Great service and these guys are really good at what they do.

name: Carl Toups
text: Great body shop, quick turn around and accepts most insurance jobs. A shop you can trust.

name: Charles Speakman
text: They do really good work and you can trust them they will make you happy

name: Febra McGuire
text: Keey your car too long

resp.text: Febra, thank you for your feedback and we want to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences this may have caused you. We understand that Wally N. has contacted you and spoke to you regarding the back order of the items for your vehicle. We want to thank you for letting us address your concerns.

name: Robert McDonald
text: These guys did a great job on my truck repairs.

name: Orrin Carter
text: Worst experience in my life! I wouldn’t send my enemy to this place! I should have followed my first mind to not let my truck be taken there. Thinking that since they do work for Geico that they would be fair. The adjuster JY was unprofessional and is in the wrong business dealing with all types of ppl. Two supervisor called me to talk with me and was all nice but wanted me to give them a call and when something did come up no answer . They raised the price up and was about to put savage parts on from junk yards!!! Then broke my truck down of unnecessary parts , sent me 3 pic of my truck where the damage was and made a mistake and included pic of a Durango include with mine in the estimated online where they dropped the ball at so they could total my truck out. $7,500 their price after I was haggled on what should be fixed or not. The under part that I was told would be looked at by Geico in Macon under and told me that everything would be fixed and even sent a wrecker for it. When I saw this scam I sent for my truck to be taken to another shop of my choice in Trussville where I live at and the price dropped to $2500 . What’s the use of having insurance for 8yrs without any incidents and was deem not my fought and still getting the run around but I guess it’s just a moody thing then , I have a 1,500 rental car limit that I pay for in my and JY told me that it had to be back today mon 2-26-18 or they wasn’t going to extended it til the next day when my truck will be ready I’m the am, how about I called jay (sup) while I was at the shop because they needed to ask him something and he told me he was going to call them and did. They just threw my parts in the back of the bed and shipped with all the unecesary parts too! New parts hand to be shipped in . This is just a scam place too much unprofessionalism going on after JY started talking to nice nasty and rushing me off the phone like I was Bothering her! So after I go meet with the ppl in Macon and send all the paper work and the pictures that I have with m parts and the Durango and explain that I had to miss work tonight because of the treat that JY told me .Also the shop ppl a security system that pick up everything that she said to them about me and my truck which is very unrespectful because they played it back so I could hear her and what she said !!!!

name: Febra McGuire

resp.text: Febra, thank you for your feedback and we want to sincerely apologize for any inconveniences this may have caused you. We understand that Wally N. has contacted you and spoke to you regarding the back order of the items for your vehicle. We want to thank you for letting us address your concerns.

name: James Eunice
text: Amazing service. My wife went in with a small issue and they fixed it for free because it was just a clip out of place. They could have over charged her or said it was somthing bigger but they didnt just amazing people.

resp.text: Patsy, thank you for this amazing feedback! We hope you have a great weekend!

name: Jerry Butcher
text: The service, quality and response were all excellent! Great work ! Couldn't be happier

name: Mike B
text: Fast and good service

name: edie jones
text: Ok place

name: Johnathan Spearman
text: Good prices

name: Tay Jackson
text: Great place

name: K. E.
text: It has taken me a few days to fully process my service experience on 5/7/21. I scheduled a service appt online for my Stelvio. I also checked the box for a loaner vehicle. I was scheduled for 4/27/21 for an oil change. Once I checked in I was told by Tom Williams, Manager, that I was not required to have any major services done on this visit but maybe the next time I would need to have my brake fluid flushed. I let him know that I would need a loaner vehicle. His response was, We don’t have any so Johnathan will take you to work. Once I picked up my truck and I was driving off I immediately noticed a different feel to my truck. I just thought it was different because they had done a tire rotation. A few days later I noticed a noise when I braked. It gradually got worse and louder. I called and spoke with Jonathan. I told him about my concerns. He told me it was probably a rock stuck between my rotors and that if it was the brakes my sensors would have let me know it and its probably just a rock but if I brought my truck first thing in the morning it would be a quick and easy fix. He told me they didn’t have any appts available and that they didn’t have any loaner cars for me to drive while they inspected my truck. When I arrived on 5/7 Jonathan stated you are gonna have to leave the truck with us you need new brakes and rotors. I asked why and he said you are metal to metal. So that’s when I immediately started asking what happened when I brought my truck last week, he apologized said the tech just didn’t catch it. I asked what about my sensors, why didn’t they go off, he stated the sensors are on the inside and this was on the outside pad. None, of this was making sense to me. I asked him for a quote for the service to be completed and of course it was approx $700 with a 10% discount. I’m fuming inside by this time bc not only have you all inconvenienced me when I could have had this service done last week, but I was in danger and you lied on my vehicle’s multi point inspection, or maybe you didn’t even do an inspection at all, but now you’re gonna double charge me for labor. I asked him who is the service manager and he stated Tom was. I explained that every time I have come here you all have told me that you do not have loaner vehicles but the last time I was there(for my oil change) he told a customer on the phone “oh no worries we’ll put you in something when you get here and you’ll be on your way”. Johnathan replied, “Oh that was probably a Maserati owner and he’s gonna put them in a loaner Maserati”. I stated, “so you are telling me that you all hold certain customers to a higher standard because of the type of car they drive”. He stated they don’t have any loaners, and someone could drive me to work. I literally paced the parking lot in disbelief bc of the lower standard of service based on the brand name of the car I drove, the oversight of my right rear brake being completely gone and scrubbing metal to metal, and the fact that over half of the cost for me to have the service done was a charge for labor for some techs that clearly half do their job. People think that it’s a myth that women get mistreated when it comes to their vehicle service but I experienced it first hand. I could have chose to be an irate customer but because I am a black woman I chose to keep my feelings, emotions, and anger inside and take the poor customer service I received. However, I do have a choice in what type of car I drive and what type of customer service I feel I should receive. I was even just considering upgrading my car. I did not feel valued and I don't think they provide the same level of customer service across the board.

name: Sal Frenda
text: Outstanding selection of cars and knowledgeable sales staff

name: Jacob Busfield
text: Daniel should be your go to guy for all your Fiat 500L and 500x needs great guy 100% on his game took care of my mom very much appreciated drove from central Mississippi they are the only fiat dealer close with a selection of cars we were literally in and out in 2 hours future customer for sure

name: Michael Kidd
text:
I don’t often leave reviews, but in this case I definitely have to because it is so well deserved, by several people, at Birmingham Alfa Romeo.

I recently traded in my 2017 Alfa Romeo Gilulia for a 2020 Giulia. Definitely the best car buying experience I’ve ever had.  I was given a fair price for my trade, and the sales price of my new car was more than fair.

My salesman, Beau Beggs, made sure I completely understood every single item during the buying process.  He is very well versed in all aspects of the Alfa line, and took the time to ensure I understood the operation of all the new car’s systems.  From the time I walked in the door, until the time I drove away I never felt pressured or hurried in any way.  For the first time, buying a car was actually enjoyable.  Thanks Beau!!

Now I get to brag about the service department manager, Tom Williams.

About 800 miles later I was driving home from work when my sunroof blew out for no apparent reason.  Needless to say, it kind of freaked me out.  I called Tom while I was still on the interstate.  He didn’t avoid the problem, didn’t ask a bunch of questions, and even though it was late in the day, he didn’t suggest any other avenue to solve the problem other than to bring them the car.  Because the glass was still falling from the sunroof Tom sent a tow truck to pick up the car and ensured the driver wrapped the car to prevent any further damage.

When I arrived at Birmingham Alfa I found out that all the loaner vehicles were out.  That didn’t stop Tom from taking care of the situation.  He simply put me into a used car (another Alfa with only 2500 miles) until another Alfa loaner vehicle was available about a week later.  In the meantime, Tom communicated the issue with Alfa, and made sure they would take care of the problem, and of course they said they would.  I was told parts were on order, and Tom would stay in touch with me as repairs progressed, which Tom did because, well... He’s Tom and he’s the best.

When the sunroof blew out the glass hit the trunk and the spoiler, causing several paint chips.  I knew they would have to touch up the paint, and that the paintwork would cause the value of the car to depreciate, and talked to Tom about it.  I knew he would do whatever he could to remedy to problem.

What I DIDN’T expect was what happened next.

I received a call from Tom.  He had communicated the issue up the food chain, to include Alfa themselves.  The Alfa brand very, very rarely has any issues at all, and they were more than a little surprised to hear of this one.... and they definitely wanted to make things right.

Birmingham Alfa, due in no small part to Tom Williams’ leadership and superb customer service, replaced my car.  My brand new car.  With another brand new car.  No hassle, no hoops to jump through, no problems at all.  In a word:  Amazing.

So.... I say all that to say this;  If you are looking for a new vehicle (or even a used one) I cannot recommend a dealership more highly than Birmingham Alfa Romeo.  Go there, find Beau Beggs, buy something.  You will not be disappointed.  As a matter of fact you will be pleasantly surprised in the experience.

Sooner or later you’ll need that vehicle serviced.  When you do, take it to no one other than Tom Williams. There is no comparison.  I have never been so pleased in the caring customer service he has provided.  both on my 2017 Alfa that I traded in, and the new one I am currently enjoying.

I don’t know who actually owns Birmingham Alfa, but if you happen to be reading this I want you to know you’re doing something right.  Keep up the good work, and keep your good people like Tom and Beau.  People like them are what keep your customers  coming back.  I know I’ll be back, and I’ll keep recommending Birmingham Alfa to others.

Thank you Beau Beggs, Tom Williams, and Birmingham Alfa, for being the exception to the rule.

name: Gary Watkins
text: Really nice place and really nice cars and trucks and deals

name: Harrison Gunn
text: Very helpful staff. Beau and Chris were great at assisting me with my purchase. Especially since i was coming from Atlanta. I highly recommend their services.

name: Zachary Root
text: They have manager special for 8 alfa romeos starting at 28000

name: Marshall Mooney
text: I'm not going to be buying an Alfa Romeo today.  That was one of the first things I told the salesman who greeted my son and I at the front door. I told him that we were just there to look at the cars and sit in a few. He was very friendly and spent probably 45 minutes talking about the cars and allowing us to peer into them and experience them. He was a really nice guy. If I were to ever be in the market for an Alfa Romeo I would go back to see him.

name: Joey Chance
text: Great service!

name: Perry Russo
text: Very knowledgeable salesman, very polite, but we haven't decided on a vehicle as of this point. But we were impressed to say the least...will go back at some point

name: Trey Nolen
text: Not super happy.   They are fairly disorganized and have trouble finding service paperwork.   My car was not even cleaned after being there for an extended period (the length of time was not their fault).   For this level of car, I do expect a bit of premium service, but that is not what you get.  The facility is very nice as are the people, but I think they need to work on some management and procedures.

resp.text: Hi Trey, I'm very sorry you were not happy with your experience.  Our service department is closed on Saturdays and it did take a few minutes to locate your paperwork.  It was a bit of an unusual situation but we do apologize for not meeting your expectations.  I'm sorry for the delay and we hope you'll give us another chance in the future to make it right.    -Jonathan Woodall

name: michael black
text: Actually at Fiat of Birmingham. Great experience there, took care of us everything short sweet exactly what you would look for in a car dealer.  Ask for Johnathan!

name: Jason Glasscock
text: Awesome, takes care of you

name: Brandon Shutt
text: If you’re looking for an Alfa Romeo, Maserati, or even a Fiat, then this is the place to go. Beau Beggs worked hard to get a deal done on a new 4C for me. He always did what he said he would, and was quick and easy to work with. Make sure you ask for him!

name: Jonathan Woodall
text: Alfa Romeo is BACK and in Birmingham at Alfa Romeo of Birmingham!!  Cannot wait to see the Giulia in person, it's going to be such an incredible car!

name: Pietro Piazza
text: Very professional, just dream cars
